title: Boris Johnson set to grant Huawei access to UK's 5G network: The Sunday Times
text:
Boris Johnson set to grant Huawei access to UK's 5G network: The Sunday Times

Tech 2 hours ago (Oct 26, 2019 21:13)

(Reuters) - British Prime Minister Boris Johnson is preparing to grant China's Huawei technologies Co Ltd access to the UK's future 5G telecoms network, the Sunday Times reported on Sunday. Senior government and security services sources said the UK is moving towards a decision that will see Huawei allowed access to the "non-contentious" parts of the network, which will open rift with United States as it has banned the company over fears that it is too close to Chinese intelligence agencies, the newspaper said.

Boris Johnson set to grant Huawei access to UK's 5G network: The Sunday Times
description: Boris Johnson set to grant Huawei access to UK's 5G network: The Sunday Times
